title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of hippie-themed pizzeria franchise with choices for vegans and vegetarians, including tofu, tempeh, vegan cheese, and fresh veggie toppings for pizza. Could build your own pizza, calzone, or salad. Be sure to tell your server to omit butter spread and parmesan cheese on the crust, and if you want vegan cheese. Has vegan beer.
